omma_desc.desc: Perform team tasks conveniently and quickly

workInTeam.title: Work in team
workInTeam.desc: Join or create teams, easily manage tasks, and keep track of your progress with insightful statistics!

teamChat.title: Team Chat
teamChat.desc: Engage in quick, clear, and seamless conversations with your teammates in the team chat!

taskMMSimple.title: Task Management Made Simple
taskMMSimple.desc: Assign tasks, track progress, and collaborate with your team. Manage deadlines, priorities, and subtasks effortlessly!
